product.name: FitPulse Pro Smartwatch
product.description: Feature-packed fitness smartwatch that doesn't break the bank. Tracks 100+ workout types, monitors heart rate and sleep, and lasts 7 days on a single charge. Perfect for fitness enthusiasts who want smart features without the premium price.

store_brand.brand_voice: Your trusted electronics expert. We make tech accessible with great prices, helpful advice, and hassle-free returns. No jargon, just the best deals.
store_brand.visual_style: Bright, clean, product-focused. Blue and orange accent colors for trust and energy. Clear pricing callouts. Organized and approachable layout.

product_brand.brand_voice: Active, motivating, and accessible. We make fitness tech for real people with real goals. No intimidation, just results.
product_brand.visual_style: Sporty and dynamic. Green and black palette. Action shots of real people working out. Clean, modern typography with motion elements.

channel.audience_context: Broad consumer electronics shoppers aged 25-50. Mix of fitness enthusiasts and mainstream consumers. Price-conscious but seeking quality and features.

store_context.customer_summary: Value-conscious tech shoppers looking for quality at fair prices. They compare specs, read reviews, and appreciate clear, honest product information.
